title: Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Evening Formal
title_original: Off The Shoulder Mother of The Bride Dresses for Women Long A-line Ruffles Chiffon Ruched Formal Evening Dress

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #226,664 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #1,214 in Women's Formal Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Formal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Cute dress it barely fit so definitely read the size chart and measure appropriately. Dress is nice deep navy blue and hides my belly perfectly. Fabric is light weight and easy to unwrinkle. No itchiness of fabric which is perfect. Definitely worth the price. Read more
items.author: Eevee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great！
items.body: This dress is for my daughter's wedding. I was so nervous about sizing . I did custom and she fit me like a glove and it shipped so quickly ! Thank you! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Dress
items.body: I wore this dress to a family wedding and absolutely loved it. I had the top taken in and felt secure and beautiful all day and got so many compliments! Read more
items.author: Joe Geremia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful!!
items.body: My dress is absolutely beautiful!! I did custom size and it turned out perfect. I did order it almost 2 months before the wedding because I loved the dress so much I was afraid it would be discontinued if I waited. I bought the champagne color by request of my daughter, the bride. I can’t wait to wear this dress. I have two more daughters that aren’t married yet, so when the time comes I know I will be getting my dresses from you. Thank you for a great experience!! Read more
items.author: Elvia Carrillo

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Evening Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Evening Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Olive Green, Fuchsia, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Eucalyptus, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Pinkc, Pinkd, Royal Blue, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
